Package com.netspective.sparx.xaf.form

Provides advanced HTML forms functionality; this includes the complete specification of dialogs in a XML-based resource format and execution of dialogs in Java classes or JSP (using a supplied tag-lib), fully interactive and user-extensible validation, skinnable look-and-feel, caching of dialog collections, and unlimited number of extended field types.

See:

Package com.netspective.sparx.xaf.form Description

Provides advanced HTML forms functionality; this includes the complete specification of dialogs in a XML-based resource format and execution of dialogs in Java classes or JSP (using a supplied tag-lib), fully interactive and user-extensible validation, skinnable look-and-feel, caching of dialog collections, and unlimited number of extended field types.
